statements: SELECT * FROM product_catalog;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_catalog WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT description, quantity FROM product_catalog ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM product_catalog WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM product_catalog WHERE description LIKE '%organic%';
SELECT * FROM product_catalog ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM product_catalog WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, description FROM product_catalog WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, description FROM product_catalog WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM product_catalog WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, product_description, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, pi.image_url FROM products p INNER JOIN product_images pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, product_description FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, pi.image_url FROM products p JOIN product_images pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM product_images);
SELECT * FROM ProductCatalog;
SELECT product_name, price FROM ProductCatalog ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM ProductCatalog WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM ProductReviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, description FROM ProductCatalog WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ProductCatalog ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM ProductCatalog WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, category FROM ProductCatalog WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM ProductInventory WHERE available_quantity < 10;
SELECT reviewer_name, rating, review_comments FROM ProductReviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT product_id, description FROM Products ORDER BY product_id DESC;

SELECT product_name, category_name FROM Products JOIN ProductCategories ON Products.product_id = ProductCategories.product_id JOIN Categories ON ProductCategories.category_id = Categories.category_id;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) as num_products FROM ProductCategories JOIN Categories ON ProductCategories.category_id = Categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT product_name, description FROM Products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 50.00;

SELECT product_name, category_name FROM Products JOIN ProductCategories ON Products.product_id = ProductCategories.product_id JOIN Categories ON ProductCategories.category_id = Categories.category_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM product_catalog;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM product_catalog WHERE brand = 'Nike' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM product_catalog GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT platform_name, platform_url FROM retail_platforms WHERE platform_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM product_catalog WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC, price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY category, price ASC;
SELECT product_name, brand, price FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, r.rating FROM product_catalog p JOIN product_ratings r ON p.product_id = r.product_id WHERE r.rating > 4.0 ORDER BY r.rating DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, i.image_url FROM product_catalog p JOIN product_images i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE image_url LIKE '%.jpg%' ORDER BY p.product_name ASC;
